definitions: a tropical Asian evergreen tree with narrow leathery leaves and oil-rich seeds.

notes.text: Genus Hydnocarpus, family Flacourtiaceae: several species, in particular H. kurzii, a principal source of the oil

shortDefinitions: tropical Asian evergreen tree with narrow leathery leaves

definitions: the oil obtained from the seeds of the chaulmoogra tree. It is used medically and as a preservative, and was formerly used in the treatment of leprosy.
shortDefinitions: oil obtained from seeds of chaulmoogra tree
